content:
Hey!
I saw some users having messages, warnings and problems displayed at the end of lines (example: on the same line as the #check). This wasn't the case in my VS Code setup.
One can get it from the VS Code extension "Error lens" : https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=usernamehw.errorlens
Just mentioning this here. I hope the title is easy to find if people search for this.
